content.value:
إِنَّا لِلّهِ وَإِنَّـا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعونَ

My beloved father, Mohammad Ahmad Akmal Khan, died on 18/09/20 (Friday). He had cancer, since Jan 2020. I've much to say about how much he meant to me; I pray, with time, I am able to. May Allah grant him a high rank in paradise. Ameen.
content.html: إِنَّا لِلّهِ وَإِنَّـا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعونَ My beloved father, Mohammad Ahmad Akmal Khan, died on 18/09/20 (Friday). He had cancer, since Jan 2020. I've much to say about how much he meant to me; I pray, with time, I am able to. May Allah grant him a high rank in paradise. Ameen.
